docs.lead_paragraph: " I know him to be a lawyer and a judge of very high ability, a patriot of deep convictions and a gentleman of undisputed integrity."
docs.abstract: 2 versions of Kennedy selection of Johnson summarized; illus of principals
docs.snippet: " I know him to be a lawyer and a judge of very high ability, a patriot of deep convictions and a gentleman of undisputed integrity."
